title: Game Click- unentitled
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user that does not have access to all the
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is watching a game to which they are entitled
AND they select a game tile from the in-player games menu
custom_expected: THEN the "You do not have access to pay this game." error message is displayed

title: Game Click-entitled
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user watching a game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects a new LIVE or ARCHIVED game from the in-player games menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the new game should begin playback with the player menu closed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects a new LIVE or ARCHIVED game from the in-player games menu
AND a favorite or followed team is involved in the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed for the favorite or followed team will play

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects a new LIVE or ARCHIVED game from the in-player games menu
AND no favorite or followed team is involved in the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the home feed will play

title: Game Click- Upcoming Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects an upcoming game in the in-player games menu

title: Hide Spoilers
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game
custom_steps: When a user has Hide Spoilers ON
custom_expected: Then game tiles will not display any player data, or score data, special states

title: Game Click - Hide Spoilers
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game
custom_steps: When a user has Hide Spoilers ON and clicks on a game
custom_expected: Then the game will start from the beginning

title: Game Tiles: MLB Free Game of the Day
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN there is another game that is a free game of the day AND the game is in a live state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a Free Game Of The Day tag will appear above the game tile.

title: Game Tiles: Youtube Game of the Week
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN there is another game that is a YouTube game of the week
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a branded youtube experience the feed select

title: Game Tiles: Apple Game of the Week
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN there is another game that is a Apple game of the week
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a branded Apple experience the feed select

title: Game Tiles : Live
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN there are live games going on at the same time
custom_expected: THEN there is a live pill above matchup tiles

title: Game Tiles : Split Squad
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a spring training game
custom_steps: WHEN there are live games going on at the same time that there are split squad games going on
custom_expected: THEN there will be a split squad pill on the matchup tile for the individual team that is a split squad game

title: Game Tiles: Perfect Game/No Hitter
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN there are "No Hitter/Perfect Game" occurring during another game
custom_expected: THEN there is a "No Hitter/Perfect Game" pill above matchup tiles

title: Game Tiles : Inning State
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN there are live games going on at the same time
custom_expected: THEN there is the inning state (top/mid/bot) next to the inning number

title: Game Tiles : Postponed/Cancelled/Suspended
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN there are games that have been Postponed/Cancelled/Suspended elsewhere
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the game state(Postponed/Cancelled/Suspended) above the matchup tile AND inside the matchup tile

title: Game Tiles : Delayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN there are games that have been Delayed elsewhere
custom_expected: THEN the user will see 'Delayed' above the matchup tile AND what inning it was delayed

title: Game Tiles : Final
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN there are games that have been completed
custom_expected: THEN the user will see 'Final' above the matchup tile

title: Game Tiles : Final Extra Innings
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN there are games that have been completed
custom_expected: THEN the user will see 'Final' above the matchup tile and what extra inning it ended in

title: Game Tiles : Final Completed Early
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game
custom_steps: WHEN there are games that have been completed
custom_expected: THEN the user will see 'Final' above the matchup tile and what inning it ended in
